hypothesis_content.title: Neutral-to-Bull Transition on Regulatory Clarity Momentum
hypothesis_content.statement: Following consecutive days of positive regulatory news (like UK framework), if BTC holds above its 10-day moving average for 3 days while daily volume increases sequentially, a breakout above the 5-day high with >20% volume spike confirms NEUTRAL-to-BULL transition, favoring long entry.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Regulatory clarity removes uncertainty tail risk. Sequential volume increase shows accumulation. The 3-day MA hold demonstrates underlying strength before breakout. Current UK news provides catalyst for regime shift if market interprets as net positive.
entry_conditions: 2+ days of positive regulatory headlines (sentiment score > 0.6)
BTC closes > 10-day MA for 3 consecutive days
Daily volume increases each of those 3 days
Price breaks above 5-day high with volume > 20% 10-day average
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Such breakouts fail to sustain >50% of the time (price returns below breakout level within 2 days) despite volume/MA conditions.
